scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Jesus on the cross, wearing a crown of thorns and a loincloth. Blood is visible on his body. A sign above his head reads 'INRI' and another inscription, 'PR DÄ°MITE QVID ILLIS OR NESTVNT FACIVNT', is partially visible. A crowd of figures surrounds the cross, some pointing upwards, others looking on. Soldiers with spears and banners are present, as well as two horses and a dog. In the background, a city with towers and buildings is visible under a blue sky with stylized clouds. The scene is framed by a decorative border.
